properties.author: NIST, Alexander Hoole, Aurelien Delaitre
properties.description: This test shows a null pointer is not dereferenced, in a local control flow.

properties.author: NIST, Romain Gaucher, Alexander Hoole, Aurelien Delaitre
properties.description: This test case avoids the problem of NULL pointer dereference.

properties.author: NIST, Romain Gaucher, Alexander Hoole, Aurelien Delaitre
properties.description: The test case shows protection against the use of an allocated memory after being freed with an address alias level code complexity.

properties.author: Toyota ITC
properties.description:
Defect Type: Numerical defects
Defect Sub-type: Data overflow
Description: Defect Free Code to identify false positives in data overflow in static declaration

properties.description:

Description: Defect Free Code to identify false positives in conditions like having return value

message.text: Unlock of a Resource that is not Locked.

properties.author: Toyota ITC
properties.description:
Defect Type: Concurrency defects
Defect Sub-type: Unlock without lock
Description: Defect Free Code to identify false positives to identify if a shared resource is unlocked without preceeding lock

properties.author: Toyota ITC
properties.description:

properties.author: Toyota ITC
properties.description:

Description: Defect Free Code to identify false positives in double lock - concurrency defects

properties.author: Toyota ITC
properties.description:

properties.description:

properties.author: Toyota ITC
properties.description:
